name: Production Line Game Alpha
description:
Summary

Production Line Game is a resource management game where you build a city and the production chains to supply all its needs. Build farms to produce crops and turn those crops into products like bread, beer, and pork.  Use conveyor belts and trains to deliver goods to your city.

Controls

W,A,S,D - move the camera
R/Shift-R - rotate building
Q - copy building
E - show building menu
X - destroy buildings
left click drag - move the camera with a empty hand or place multiple buildings
right click - stop placing building
mouse wheel - zoom in and out

Alpha

The game is a early prototype so it may crash or have weird issues.

  • Use F1 to quickly save the game, F5 to load the quicksave
  • If a train is driving around without stopping, click on the train and click "repath".
